page.title: 09Transport in Cressage
page.content: We have found out that 90% of the housholds own{cars,}10% don't. The most popular cars in Cressage and the surrounding area are{Fords. They have a wide range of models and are resonably priced. Most of the cars in Cressage were {first registered}in 1978. From our questionaire we found that 74% of the households had a{garage, 26% didn't. We have investigated{bike}ownership. 26 households haven't got a bike which means the percentage who have a bike is 67%. The main{bus service}runs between {Shrewsbury and Bridgenorth.}The first bus to Shrewsbury leaves at 8:00am. The last bus to Shrewsbury leaves at 7:40pm.Through the day buses run about every 90 minutes.
